attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in ALL politicians.
attributes.additional_details:
No matter what party you follow, vote or agree with.
This is a vote/petition of a “No confidence” with ALL MP’s.
Do you think that they hear your views?
Do you think they can make their own rules?
Do you think that they do not hear your views?
Do you think that they have their own agendas?
Do you think that they think they are better than you?
We, as a democracy which people (our older family have fought, died and suffered) for our rights to be a democratic vote of the people views.
attributes.background: Who is feed up with ALL politicians whether in or out, shale it all about, left or right, red, green, blue, yellow  or any other colour. Do they work for US?

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
